Surveillance systems can be categorized in different ways to highlight specific characteristics. These categories are not mutually exclusive, and a surveillance system can typically fit into several categories.

- eventsurveillance
- labsurveillance
- activepassivesurveillance
- collaborativesurveillance
- wastewater
- emergencyroom
- mortality
